The words of a new interlude, called the Four seasons, or Love in every age. And of all the musical entertainments, in the new opera, called the Island Princess, or The generous Portuguese. Performed at the Theatre Royal. / Written by Mr. Motteux. Motteux, Pierre Antoine. Motteux, Peter Anthony, 1660-1718. Island princess.
[4], 20 p.
Printed for R. Basset, at the George over against the Inner-Temple-Lane in Fleetstreet., London, : 1699.
Without music. Reproduction of original in the Boston Public Library.
=======
